text:
We are using the Deals API v3 and one frustration we have found is that custom stages cannot be referenced by their name only an ID and as the ID is different per environment this makes it quite difficult to work on.
Is there any plans to update this
is it possible to update the `Marketing contact status` through api?

Hello everyone,

Relatively new to HubSpot development, particularly when it comes to API work.

Quick question, it seems like there is no way to designate, one-to-many vs. many-to-many relationships when it comes to making new objects and their associations. Is this correct? So it ends up being whatever you make it. This just scares me a little coming from making my own backend environmentsâ€¦and the specificity often involved in doing it correctly.
